ranged_specialization.title: Deadeye Sniper's Precision
ranged_specialization.description: Perfect the art of ranged combat, increasing arrow damage by 15% and arrow velocity by 10% to devastate enemies from a distance.

arrow_damage+5%.title: Hunter's Precision
arrow_damage+5%.description: Hone your archery skills to deal 5% more damage with arrows. Each shot finds vital targets with deadly accuracy.

arrow_damage+10%.title: Lethal Marksmanship
arrow_damage+10%.description: Master the deadly art of archery, increasing arrow damage by 10%. Your arrows penetrate deeper, striking with devastating force.

arrow_velocity+10%.title: Piercing Trajectory
arrow_velocity+10%.description: Launch arrows with 10% greater velocity, allowing them to travel faster and hit targets from further away with less drop.

draw_speed+15%.title: Swift Bowstring
draw_speed+15%.description: Develop faster nocking techniques, increasing bow draw speed by 15%. Prepare shots more quickly in the heat of battle.

draw_speed+30%.title: Master Fletcher's Rhythm
draw_speed+30%.description: Perfect the art of rapid arrow preparation, increasing draw speed by 30%. Your hands move with supernatural fluidity, readying shots in half the time of novice archers.

crit_chance+3%_ranged.title: Eagle Eye Precision
crit_chance+3%_ranged.description: Develop uncanny accuracy, gaining 3% increased chance to land critical hits with ranged weapons. Your eyes find weaknesses others cannot see.

crit_damage+15%_ranged.title: Vital Point Targeting
crit_damage+15%_ranged.description: Master the knowledge of anatomical weaknesses, increasing critical hit damage by 15%. Your critical strikes find arteries and vital organs with unerring precision.

agility+5%.title: Ranger's Mobility
agility+5%.description: Cultivate the light-footed grace of a forest ranger, increasing movement speed by 5%. Navigate battlefields and reposition with enhanced swiftness.

dodge_chance+2%.title: Elusive Footwork
dodge_chance+2%.description: Master the art of battlefield movement, gaining a 2% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks. Step aside from danger with practiced precision.

minor_arrow_damage_1.title: Archer's Focus
minor_arrow_damage_1.description: Begin your archery training, increasing arrow damage by 3%. A small but important first step toward mastery of the bow.

minor_arrow_velocity_1.title: Steady Pull
minor_arrow_velocity_1.description: Learn proper drawing technique, increasing arrow velocity by 3%. Your arrows fly slightly faster and straighter.

minor_draw_speed_1.title: Swift Fingers
minor_draw_speed_1.description: Develop basic dexterity, increasing bow draw speed by 3%. The first skill every archer must learn is how to quickly ready their weapon.

minor_crit_chance_1.title: Careful Aim
minor_crit_chance_1.description: Train your eye to spot weaknesses, gaining a 2% chance to land critical hits. Even a novice archer occasionally finds the perfect shot.

minor_crit_damage_1.title: Vital Knowledge
minor_crit_damage_1.description: Learn basic anatomy, increasing critical hit damage by 5%. Understanding where to aim makes your critical hits slightly more effective.

entity_interaction_range+1.title: Distant Perception
entity_interaction_range+1.description: Extend your reach by 1 block when interacting with creatures and objects. Your keen senses allow manipulation from safer distances.

hunter_specialization.title: Apex Predator
hunter_specialization.description: Become a legendary hunter with 10% increased arrow damage and 5% higher critical chance. Your reputation strikes fear into creatures both common and mythical.

sniper_specialization.title: Phantom Marksman
sniper_specialization.description: Master long-range combat with 15% increased arrow velocity and 10% more critical damage. Strike from distances others cannot comprehend with devastating precision.

skirmisher_specialization.title: Verdant Wind Dancer
skirmisher_specialization.description: Embrace the agile combat style of forest skirmishers with 30% faster draw speed and 20% increased movement speed. Dart between positions, loosing arrows with fluid grace.

minor_arrow_damage.title: Steady Hand
minor_arrow_damage.description: Improve your archery fundamentals, increasing arrow damage by 0.02%. Your arrows strike with slightly greater impact.

medium_arrow_damage.title: Sharpshooter
medium_arrow_damage.description: Refine your marksmanship, increasing arrow damage by 4%. Your knowledge of proper shot placement results in more effective attacks.

major_arrow_damage.title: Deadeye Striker
major_arrow_damage.description: Achieve masterful accuracy with ranged weapons, increasing arrow damage by 10%. Every shot is released with calculated precision.

minor_arrow_velocity.title: Strong Draw
minor_arrow_velocity.description: Strengthen your draw arm, increasing arrow velocity by 5%. Your arrows fly straighter and with less arc.

medium_arrow_velocity.title: Penetrating Shot
medium_arrow_velocity.description: Master techniques for powerful shots, increasing arrow velocity by 10%. Your arrows cut through the air with impressive speed.

minor_draw_speed.title: Quick Nock
minor_draw_speed.description: Learn to nock arrows more efficiently, increasing draw speed by 10%. Ready your bow slightly faster for each shot.

medium_draw_speed.title: Fluid Motion
medium_draw_speed.description: Develop smoother bow handling techniques, increasing draw speed by 7%. Your hands move with practiced coordination.

minor_ranged_crit.title: Keen Vision
minor_ranged_crit.description: Sharpen your perception to spot vital targets, gaining 2% increased critical hit chance with ranged attacks.

medium_ranged_crit.title: Focused Aim
medium_ranged_crit.description: Learn to focus intently on your target, increasing critical hit chance by 2%. Your concentration allows you to find exploitable weaknesses.

minor_ranged_crit_damage.title: Penetrating Strike
minor_ranged_crit_damage.description: Craft arrows with exceptional penetrating power, increasing critical hit damage by 5%. Your critical strikes pierce deeper.

medium_ranged_crit_damage.title: Lethal Precision
medium_ranged_crit_damage.description: Master the art of targeting vulnerable areas, increasing critical hit damage by 10%. Your critical shots are devastatingly effective.

minor_agility.title: Light Step
minor_agility.description: Learn to move with a lighter step, increasing movement speed by 2%. Greater mobility enhances your combat positioning.

minor_dodge.title: Swift Reflexes
minor_dodge.description: Develop faster reflexes, gaining a 2% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks. Your instincts help you evade danger.

barrage_mastery.title: Storm of Arrows
barrage_mastery.description: Master the art of rapid fire with 25% increased draw speed and 10% more arrow damage. Release a relentless barrage of arrows that overwhelms your enemies with volume and power.

projectile_master.title: Legendary Marksman
projectile_master.description: Achieve legendary status with all projectile weapons, increasing damage by 25%. Your mastery extends to bows, crossbows, tridents, and any other thrown or launched weapon.

nametag_distance.title: Eagle-Eyed Recognition
nametag_distance.description: Your vision sharpens to supernatural clarity, increasing nametag visibility distance by 10 blocks. Identify friends and foes from remarkable distances, gaining critical tactical information before engagement.

mob_detection_range.title: Shadow Walker's Stealth
mob_detection_range.description: Move like a ghost through the wilderness, reducing hostile mob detection range by 20%. Creatures sense your presence only when you draw much closer, allowing for stealthy approaches and safer exploration.

health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

medium_dodge.title: Shadow Dancer
medium_dodge.description: Move with increased agility to gain a 2% chance of dodging attacks entirely through quick reflexes.

major_dodge.title: Phantom's Mirage
major_dodge.description: Move like a phantom to gain a 3% chance to completely evade incoming attacks through supernatural reflexes.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

projectile_damage.title: Ballistic Perfection
projectile_damage.description: Master the art of projectile warfare, increasing all projectile damage by 5%. Your arrows, tridents, and thrown weapons cut through the air with deadly precision, striking with enhanced force.

critical_bonus_damage.title: Assassin's Fatal Strike
critical_bonus_damage.description: Master the art of exploiting weaknesses, increasing critical hit bonus damage by 5%. When your strikes find vital points, they deal devastating additional damage, often ending fights in a single, perfect blow.

armor_pierce.title: Phantom Strike Technique
armor_pierce.description: Master the secret arts of bypassing defenses, ignoring 5% of your target's armor. Your attacks find the joints and weaknesses in any protection, striking as if facing a less armored foe.

attack_knockback.title: Titan's Forceful Impact
attack_knockback.description: Your strikes carry tremendous force, increasing knockback by 0.5. Enemies are sent flying farther when struck, creating tactical distance and preventing them from retaliating immediately.

prot_pierce.title: Enchantment Nullifier
prot_pierce.description: You've studied the arcane weaknesses of magical protection, allowing your attacks to bypass 2 points of enchantment protection. Your weapon strikes slice through magical barriers as if they were mere illusions.

prot_shred.title: Warding Dissolution
prot_shred.description: Your attacks erode magical defenses, temporarily reducing enchantment protection by 3%. Each strike weakens the arcane shields surrounding your enemy, rendering them increasingly vulnerable to subsequent blows.

invincibility_ticks.title: Temporal Displacement Shield
invincibility_ticks.description: After taking damage, you briefly phase partially out of normal time, extending your invulnerability period by 5 ticks. This temporal displacement provides crucial moments to recover and reposition during intense combat.

bow_velocity.title: Powerful Draw
bow_velocity.description: Perfect your bowstring technique to increase arrow velocity by 10%. Your arrows fly faster and straighter, making them harder to dodge and extending their effective range.

crossbow_velocity.title: Optimized Crossbow
crossbow_velocity.description: Fine-tune your crossbow mechanisms to increase bolt velocity by 10%. Your projectiles travel with devastating speed, maintaining deadly accuracy over greater distances.

exposure_tactics.title: Exposure Tactics
exposure_tactics.description: Force enemies into exposed positions, reducing their ranged resistance by 8%. Your tactical strikes compromise their ability to defend against incoming projectiles.

resilience_disruption.title: Resilience Disruption
resilience_disruption.description: Your attacks temporarily weaken an enemy's physical resilience, reducing their resistance attribute by 5%. Strike at pressure points that momentarily disrupt their ability to withstand damage from all sources.

armor_penetration.title: Armor Penetration
armor_penetration.description: Learn to target weak points in armor, reducing enemy armor points by 2 when you attack. Your precision strikes find gaps in protective gear, bypassing a portion of their defensive value.

toughness_penetration.title: Structural Weakness Exploitation
toughness_penetration.description: Identify and exploit structural weaknesses in enemy armor, reducing armor toughness by 2 when you attack. Your blows target points where material strength is compromised, diminishing the armor's ability to absorb heavy impacts.

projectile_avoidance.title: Projectile Awareness
projectile_avoidance.description: Train your reflexes to subconsciously avoid projectiles, reducing ranged damage by 8%. Your body instinctively shifts to minimize exposure to incoming arrows and other missiles.
